secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with well-known weather phenomena can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "umbrella" and "sunscreen".

I believe the secret rule is:

The objects that are allowed in the game are items that are used for sun/weather protection.

Therefore, my final guess for the secret rule in this "Guess the Rule" game is that the allowed items are those that are used for sun or weather protection.

Correct! The rule is: Only items that are typically associated with well-known weather phenomena can be brought to the picnic. Your guess of "The objects that are allowed in the game are items that are used for sun/weather protection" is semantically identical to the secret rule. Well done!
